name: Goofi
description:
A puzzle platformer with hand crafted levels and Editor

Goofy A Puzzle Platformer is my new project build on `GodotEngine 3.0` in which I am trying to achieve my long time goal of creating an "Abstract Platformer"

Update: https://frogsquare.itch.io/goofi/devlog/8439/level-edidor
